name: really really auto chess
description:
Hi!

This is chess with some randomness, or shortly speaking: auto chess. Your goal is to kill opposite king! To achieve this your pieces should pass his first line on chess board.

Good luck! :) 

Some boring info.

1. This game also produces combo attack mechanics. It's very similar to checkers.

2. If piece can kill it kills. :)

2. Each piece has its own damage, that it inflict to king:

Pawn - 10 points

Knight - 10 points

Rook - 2 points

Bishop - 2 points

Queen - 1 point

3. PvP means Player vs Player (or local coop). PvE means Player vs Environment (or battle with bot).

4. To spawn piece you should drag and drop it from left side to board. 

Have fun, good day and all you want!
